name: Team Punchbag - Rhythm Clicker
description:
Rhythm Clicker is a casual Incremental where you click to the beat to increase your score and multiplier. Go out of beat and you'll loose your multiplier, while your score will head into your overall score! Try to get as many beat clicks as you can in a row!

Controls:

Click to the beat to get point.
